branchCategory.name: Air Dryers
branchCategory.description: <p>Moisture is the enemy of pneumatic systems, and SMC has a wide array of air dryers to keep moisture out of your systems. A wide range of sizes are available to meet flow ranges from 10~1000 liters per minute  (ANR) and dew points from -15 to -60 degrees C.</p>

branchItem.name: Refrigerated Air Dryers
branchItem.description: <p>IDF* series refrigerated air dryers are available in multiple configurations for use around the world.&nbsp; These standard inlet air temperture models (max. 122~149&deg;F [50~65&deg;C]) reliably generate dew points down to 37</span>&deg;F (2.&deg;C) that is suitable for most industrial applications.&nbsp; All feature environmentally friendly R134a or R407C refrigerants, compact designs and stainless steel heat exchangers.</p>

branchItem.name: Membrane Air Dryers
Heatless Regenerative Dryers
